item.content:encoded:
Justin Sun once again set the crypto world abuzz. As reported by CoinDesk, Sun stepped in with a critical injection of liquidity to support TrueUSD (TUSD) amid a staggering $456 million reserve gap—averting a potential depegging crisis that could have rocked the stablecoin ecosystem.

“Godzilla was destroying the city. I’m Ultraman—I came in and punched Godzilla to save everyone,” Sun told Hong Kong media outlet Sing Tao Daily, in his trademark flair.

But behind the theatrics lies a much graver mission. Sun is taking on the alleged fraud by First Digital Trust (FDT) and its affiliated partners, urging Hong Kong regulators & and law enforcement agencies to take decisive measures to address these loopholes.  “These assets are essentially public users’ money,” he said. “To protect users and uphold Hong Kong’s credibility as a global financial hub, I had to step in. The scale of the fraud shocked me. All fraudsters must be held accountable.”

To accelerate the investigation and bring resolution to the incident, Sun also announced a $50 million bounty program for anyone who can provide crucial leads. “This isn’t just about money,” he added. “It’s about justice for the Web3 industry.”

A Relentless Defender of Crypto

Crypto has always been a volatile adventure. Bull runs feel like reaching for the stars, while crashes leave only wreckage. But in these uncertain times, Justin Sun has made it his role to keep the lights on. He’s not just a survivor—he’s a watchman. Someone who shows up when others hesitate.

The Ethereum Showdown: Twice Tested, Never Broken

Sun’s relationship with Ethereum has been nothing short of a saga.

During the infamous May 19, 2021 crash, ETH dipped below $2,000 and Sun was inches away from liquidation. He repaid $300 million just in time to protect his 606,000 ETH position and threw in another $280 million to buy more ETH and BTC at fire-sale prices.

“My assets were safe, but it felt like a bullet grazed my scalp. The wick was brutal,” he wrote on Weibo. It wasn’t just a trade. It was a battle of conviction. He shielded his own position while keeping the crypto dream alive.

In 2024, ETH lagged in performance and Sun faced fresh rumors of massive losses and sell-offs. Instead of retreating, he proposed bold plans: Halt ETH Sales, heavily tax Layer 2 solutions, streamline foundation & optimize revenue. 

Wild? Maybe. But Sun has always married ambition with execution.

Reviving HTX: From Burnout to Breakout

Critics once joked that Sun “got burned” buying into HTX (formerly Huobi). When he stepped in as Global Advisor in October 2022, the market was reeling from FTX’s collapse, and centralized exchanges were under siege. HTX had lost ground—and users.

Today, HTX is thriving. Trading volume and user activity are up, euro-stablecoin trading is on top three globally, and its CIS market share is dominant. It even made Forbes’ list of “Top 25 Most Trustworthy Crypto Exchanges of 2025.”

The same exchange that once looked like a liability? Now a pillar of Sun’s empire.

FTX Fallout: Standing in the Storm

When FTX collapsed in November 2022, chaos swept the markets. Sun publicly pledged to support TRON-related tokens and HT assets with 1:1 redemption. He even told Bloomberg he was prepared to inject “billions” to help FTX, subject to due diligence.

FTX ultimately folded, but Sun’s swift move bought time for users and preserved value within the TRON and HTX ecosystems.

The Curve Crisis: DeFi Gets a Lifeline

DeFi’s fragility was exposed again in 2023 when Curve Finance was hacked. Founder Michael Egorov faced possible liquidation on $100M in loans. As CRV tanked, Sun and allies stepped in, purchasing 72 million CRV for $28.8 million to shore up the protocol.

He didn’t stop there—Sun launched a stUSDT pool on TRON, giving the ecosystem a boost. Some say it was strategic self-interest. But in a storm, does it matter who holds the umbrella, as long as someone does?

Controversial but Unshaken

Sun’s name always invites debate. Opportunist or idealist? Visionary or self-promoter? The truth probably lies somewhere in between. Yes, he’s bold. Yes, he’s ambitious. But when others flee, he steps forward.

From converting $HT to $HTX, to partnering with WLFI on reserve-backed assets, Sun continues to bet on crypto’s long-term future. “I’m not here to make a quick buck,” he once said. “I want to build something that lasts.”

Love him or not, in the darkest hours of Web3, Justin Sun has made a habit of showing up with a flashlight.

item.content:encoded:
In the realm of cryptocurrency futures trading, ordinary traders often face multiple challenges. Challenges such as information asymmetry, delayed responses, and ineffective strategy execution frequently put traders in a passive position, causing them to miss opportunities. However, the emergence of alert features provides traders with a suite of proactive risk control tools.

Gate.io’s futures trading platform has successfully addressed these challenges by offering a comprehensive and practical set of alert tools, creating a closed-loop risk control system from prevention to execution. 

Gate.io provides one of the the most extensive and diverse alert functions, catering to different trading needs. Users can simply update and open the app, enter the futures trading candlestick chart page, and click the alert button at the bottom to start a new trading experience.

Price Alerts: Precisely Capture Key Price Levels, Farewell to Passive Copy Trading

Price fluctuations are among the most critical factors for traders. Gate.io’s price alert feature provides traders with a tool to accurately capture key price points, helping them avoid missing opportunities due to emotional trading.

Users can customize price trigger conditions based on their trading strategies and risk preferences, including price rises to or falls to a certain level, 5-minute rise %, 5-minute fall %, 24-hour rise %, and 24-hour fall %. Gate.io’s price alert feature also supports multidimensional differential alerts, allowing users to choose the latest price, mark price, or index price as the alert benchmark to accommodate different trading strategies.

Now, Gate.io continues to develop new alert dimensions to enhance traders’ experience. In the future, users will be able to set alerts for price rise, entering channel, and exiting channel, further enriching price alert scenarios and enabling more comprehensive market monitoring. For example, when the price enters or exits a specific price range, traders can promptly adjust their strategies to capture market trends.

In terms of application, the price alert feature can be used for profit-taking and stop-limit strategy, helping traders set key levels in advance to avoid unnecessary losses due to market fluctuations. It also assists in breakout strategies, capturing trend initiation signals. For instance, when BTC breaks a resistance level, traders can promptly adjust their strategies to seize market opportunities.

High Volatility Alerts: A Shield Against Market Shock

In the cryptocurrency market, high price volatility is the norm, especially in fluctuating conditions where market uncertainty increases. To help traders better navigate such complex situations, Gate.io has introduced the high volatility alert feature. The feature’s core value lies in accurately managing fluctuations, helping traders turn market risks into profit opportunities in futures trading.

The high volatility alert allows users to customize the monitoring period and fluctuation threshold based on their trading strategies. For example, short-term traders can set a shorter monitoring period to capture quick trading opportunities, while long-term traders can set a longer monitoring period to avoid being misled by short-term price changes.

From a risk control perspective, this feature can monitor price fluctuations and issue early warnings for extreme market conditions, helping users quickly stop losses or adjust positions. When the market experiences significant volatility, traders receive alert notifications, allowing them to take timely action to prevent losses. Additionally, this feature helps capture opportunities in rising and falling markets, assisting traders in executing their strategies effectively.

Notably, the high volatility alert focuses more on price fluctuations (ampl) rather than simple price increases or decreases. Even if the price movement within five minutes is minor, the ampl difference could be substantial, indicating potential trading opportunities. Traders may need to adjust their strategies accordingly. For instance, when major cryptocurrencies experience sharp fluctuations, other trading pairs in the market may exhibit correlated movements.

Moreover, newly listed tokens often experience significant short-term volatility, making them suitable for selling high, buying low. With the high volatility alert, traders can immediately detect these opportunities and gain a competitive edge.

The core value of this alert feature is to help traders make trading decisions based on volatility frequency. It can alert traders to arbitrage opportunities arising from extreme fluctuations in the spot-futures price difference or cross-futures price difference. At the same time, upon receiving an alert, users can take emergency actions such as closing positions or adding margin to prevent losses caused by market fluctuations.

Funding Rate Alert: The Hidden Tool for Arbitrage and Holding Costs

The funding rate is a crucial mechanism in Gate.io’s futures trading, reflecting market balance between long and short positions and the impact of funding costs on returns. With the funding rate alert feature, users can receive notifications before or after funding rate settlements, allowing them to adjust their trading strategies in time. This feature also supports alerts for sudden changes in funding rates, such as the inflection point between positive and negative fee rates, and a sudden surge in the absolute fee rate.

In terms of user returns, the funding rate’s positive or negative value represents market sentiment and can be utilized for spot-futures arbitrage. The strategy works as follows: when a positive funding rate alert is triggered, traders can buy spot assets and short perpetual futures to earn the funding fee from short positions. Conversely, during a prolonged negative funding rate period, traders can sell spot assets and go long on perpetual futures to earn funding fees from long positions. When executing these trades, traders can further consider market sentiment and risk-reward ratios to optimize their strategy.

Another key application of the funding rate alert is helping traders manage their holding costs. By staying informed of funding rate changes, traders can adjust their positions and reduce holding costs, ultimately improving long-term trading profitability.

Unlock Benefits and Experience Smart Trading Now

With its comprehensive alert features, Gate.io’s futures trading platform provides traders with an entirely new trading experience. Price alert, high volatility alert, and funding rate alert together form a complete and practical risk control system, effectively helping traders seize opportunities and mitigate risks in a complex market environment.

To fully experience these powerful alert features, users can update the Gate.io app to the latest version and activate them. Additionally, Gate.io offers futures bonus to help users familiarize themselves with the platform’s features. For more details, visit the Gate.io Rewards Hub.

Please be noted that Gate.io may restrict or prohibit the use of all or a portion of the Services from Restricted Locations. For more information, please read the User Agreement.

item.content:encoded:
In the crypto world, a market shock is an extremely complex state characterized by intensified volatility, reduced liquidity, and sluggish market sentiment. The recent price change of BTC is a typical reflection of such market conditions.

In this environment, Gate.io Futures trading, with its unique advantages such as two-way profit potential, spot-futures arbitrage, and leverage efficiency, has become an essential tool for investors to cope with market fluctuations. Compared to the passive holding strategy of spot trading, futures trading provides investors with more flexible options.

This article aims to provide investors with a comprehensive hedging guide, covering strategies and tools, helping them survive the market shock steadily while achieving returns.

Gate.io Futures: A Powerful Tool for Trading in a Market Shock

Grid Trading Bots: Automated Solutions for a Volatile Market

In a market shock, grid trading bots become a reliable assistant for investors. Based on traditional grid trading, Gate.io has added multiple bot strategies to meet different users’ trading needs. The creators of these strategies are called “Bot Providers”. Users can copy their strategies with one click to easily experience the charm of bot trading.

By checking the performance of bots created by other users in the “Leaderboard” or “Bot Pool”, users can select reliable traders’ bots to copy based on factors such as annualized returns, total profits, and bot runtime.

In addition, in a market shock, it is also recommended to use the Neutral Futures Grid Bot. This bot adopts a sell-high, buy-low trading model, intelligently handling market fluctuations and bringing stable returns to investors. Backtest data shows that this bot outperforms traditional manual trading strategies under various market conditions. It can automatically identify market fluctuation ranges, buy when prices drop, and sell when prices rise, thereby achieving automated profit accumulation.

Spot-Futures Arbitrage and Hedge Mode: Coping with Market Fluctuations Flexibly

In a market shock, the spot-futures arbitrage strategy is one of the key approaches for investors to deal with market fluctuations. This strategy also provides an effective risk management tool for investors. By simultaneously holding spot and short futures positions, it hedges price fluctuation risks, helping investors reduce or even eliminate potential losses from holding cryptocurrencies, while also earning the corresponding funding fees based on market trends. For example, when investors hold a Bitcoin spot, they can also open a short futures position. If the spot price drops and the funding rate is positive, profits from the futures position can effectively offset the spot losses, while earning the funding fee.

The core advantage of spot-futures arbitrage lies in its strong risk management ability, profit locking, and effective response to market uncertainty. This strategy provides investors with a solid way to protect their asset value, maintaining relative stability even in the face of drastic market fluctuations.

At the same time, the hedge mode strategy also offers investors an effective risk management tool. Gate.io perpetual futures support hedge mode, allowing users to hold long and short positions simultaneously under the same futures.

This mode grants investors greater flexibility, enabling them to capture long opportunities when the market rises while profiting from short positions when the market falls. It also provides strong risk hedging capabilities. By independently managing and adjusting long and short positions, investors can achieve more comprehensive trading control, maintaining steady trading status in a complex and ever-changing market.

Risk Management Tools: Steady Handling of Futures Trading

Tiered Liquidation and Margin Ratio: Reducing Liquidation Risks

Risk management is a critical aspect of futures trading. Gate.io introduces a tiered liquidation mechanism that provides investors with an effective risk buffer. When users trigger liquidation and the position size is too large, the system will lower the risk limit by one tier and partially liquidate the position exceeding the limit. The core of this mechanism lies in gradually reducing the position size to lower the user’s leverage ratio, thereby easing margin pressure.

At the same time, Gate.io’s tiered margin ratio mechanism also provides investors with a flexible fund management solution. According to the user’s position size, the platform sets different margin ratios. When the user’s position size is small, the margin ratio is relatively low, allowing users to participate in trading with less capital and reducing funding pressure. As the position size increases, the margin ratio will also rise accordingly to ensure sufficient risk coverage.

Take-Profit and Stop-Limit Strategies: Lock in Profits and Control Risks

Take-profit and stop-limit are indispensable risk management tools in futures trading. Gate.io offers multiple take-profit and stop-limit strategies, among which the basic option is the trailing take-profit. This strategy automatically adjusts the closing trigger price based on market price fluctuations, making it especially suitable for trending markets. When the price moves in a favorable direction, the trailing take-profit order will adjust the trigger price accordingly, helping users maximize profits.

The upgraded solution, “OCO Orders” (One Cancels the Other), provides investors with a more advanced risk management tool. An OCO order is a combination of a take-profit order and a stop-limit order. Once one order is executed, the other will be automatically canceled. This mechanism allows traders to automatically implement risk management strategies without continuously monitoring the market.

For example, if the price reaches the take-profit level, the take-profit order will be triggered and the stop-limit order canceled, allowing the investor to automatically secure profits. Conversely, if the price hits the stop-limit level, the stop-limit order will be triggered and the take-profit order canceled, effectively limiting losses. OCO orders not only improve risk management efficiency but also help investors maintain trading discipline, avoiding impulsive decisions during intense market fluctuations.

Comprehensive Ecosystem Support to Assist Trading Decisions

Beginner’s Guide: Simulated Trading and Copy Trading Protection

For novice investors, Gate.io provides a well-rounded beginner’s survival zone to help them quickly adapt to futures trading. The futures testnet is the best starting point for beginners, allowing users to trade with virtual funds and experience the entire process of futures trading in a zero-risk environment. Through simulation, novice investors can familiarize themselves with the trading process and test strategies without worrying about capital loss.

In addition, the star trader copy trading system provides beginners with another way to learn and grow. With the copy trading protection mechanism, the platform’s lead traders’ risk control systems and copy trading compensation coupons offer additional security guarantees. New investors can choose to follow the strategies of experienced star traders, allowing them to quickly grasp the essence of futures trading.

Advanced Guide: Data-Driven Decision Support

For experienced investors, Gate.io offers abundant data support to help them achieve data-driven decision-making. The market big data function provides investors with comprehensive market information, including capital flows, futures positions, long-short ratios, and block orders. These data points enable investors to deeply understand market dynamics and capture potential trading opportunities.

In addition, the platform offers various coin rankings and ecosystem analysis tools. Through these tools, investors can quickly identify market hotspots, analyze market trends, and make more accurate trading decisions based on data. This data-driven decision-making model not only improves trading efficiency but also helps investors maintain a competitive edge in complex market environments, achieving long-term and stable returns.

Survival Rules Summary: Three Key Principles for Steady Trading

In a volatile market, the survival rules for futures trading can be summarized into three key points: low leverage, strict stop-limit, and avoiding forced holding. Low leverage can effectively reduce risks and ensure that investors maintain a stable capital status during market fluctuations. Strict stop-limit settings are crucial for protecting investors’ funds. By reasonably setting take-profit and stop-limit levels, investors can lock in profits and control losses amid market volatility. Avoiding forced holding is an important principle to prevent excessive risk exposure. Investors should avoid blindly holding positions when the market is unfavorable to prevent greater losses.

When facing a volatile market, investors need to remain calm and rational. By combining the strategies and tools provided in this article, they can formulate a trading plan that suits their needs. Through the proper use of risk management tools, flexible adjustment of trading strategies, and full utilization of the platform’s ecosystem support system, investors can survive steadily in complex market environments and achieve profits.

item.content:encoded:
In the digital asset trading space, traditional multi-account management has long been a challenge for traders. Scattered funds, complex operations, and high barriers to cross-market trading significantly hinder trading efficiency.

Gate.io Unified Account presents a breakthrough solution to this dilemma. Built on an all-in-one concept, it serves as a centralized trading hub integrating multiple functions, designed to help traders explore new trading possibilities while balancing efficiency and risk. This article provides an in-depth analysis of the Unified Account’s features and practical applications, empowering traders to enhance capital utilization and achieve seamless asset management.

Gate.io Unified Account: A Powerful Tool for Efficiency and Risk Control

The core value of Gate.io Unified Account lies in its ability to offer convenience and profitability to users. With support for 160+ assets collateral as margin, shared margin across different trading products, offsetting profits and losses across positions, and even using unrealized profits as margin, this design maximizes capital efficiency, ensuring that every dollar makes greater value for traders.

At the same time, trading complexity is significantly reduced. Within a Unified Account, users can directly trade Spot, Margin, USDT Perpetual Futures, and Options without the hassle of transferring funds between multiple accounts. This streamlines operations and enhances execution speed.

Another standout feature is centralized risk management. As long as the total assets in the account meet the initial and maintenance margin requirements, users can continue opening or holding positions. The system calculates risk across all positions, effectively preventing liquidation cascades triggered by a single asset.

Four Unified Account Modes: Tailored for Different Trading Needs

Classic Spot Mode: The Ideal Choice for Beginners and Conservative Investors

The Classic Spot Mode offers a moderate level of risk, learning curve, and capital utilization, making it suitable for the following users:

  • Beginners who lack experience with margin trading and have a low risk tolerance;
  • Long-term holders focused on accumulating spot assets;
  • Fiat traders who only purchase and hold cryptocurrencies using fiat currency.

In clear bullish or bearish trends, users can trade spot assets directly without leveraging to amplify gains or risks. For beginners, small-scale test trades help them familiarize themselves with the platform without the complexity of advanced functions. Additionally, stablecoin savings is a key feature of this mode, allowing users to deposit USDT, USDC, and other stablecoins to earn interest without using leverage.

From a strategic perspective, auto-investing in spot is a common approach, where users regularly purchase and hold BTC, ETH, and other major cryptocurrencies to mitigate cost fluctuations and reduce market volatility risks. Grid trading, which automates buy-low and sell-high operations within a defined price range, is ideal for users with some experience. Cross-platform arbitrage is another feasible strategy, allowing users to profit from price differences across exchanges, though it requires manual fund transfers.

Single-Currency Margin Mode: A Stable Choice for Low-Leverage Trading

The single-currency margin mode offers a moderate risk level, learning curve, and capital utilization rate, making it suitable for two main types of users:

  • New futures traders who are trying leverage trading for the first time, looking to gain experience while managing risks;
  • Directional traders with a strong bullish or bearish outlook on a specific asset, aiming to amplify returns through leverage.

In terms of trading strategies, this mode supports low-leverage, stable trading. Users can opt for 2-5x leverage, effectively reducing liquidation risks. A fundamental approach in this mode is one-way leveraged trading, where users open long positions when expecting a price increase and short positions when anticipating a decline, using USDT as margin. Additionally, a laddered take-profit and stop-loss strategy is commonly used—by placing incremental orders, traders can lock in profits and manage risks amid market fluctuations.

This mode exclusively supports USDT as margin, isolating spot holdings of other assets for improved risk management and trading convenience.

Cross-Currency Margin Mode: A High-Efficiency Strategy for Multi-Asset Trading

The cross-currency margin mode involves a medium-to-high risk level and learning curve but offers superior capital utilization, making it ideal for:

  • Multi-asset holders of BTC, ETH, SOL, and other assets, looking to optimize capital efficiency
  • Arbitrage traders who are profiting from price discrepancies between different assets, such as BTC/ETH exchange rate fluctuations, as well as those skilled in spot-futures arbitrage or funding rate arbitrage;
  • Intermediate to advanced traders who are proficient in leverage mechanics and capable of managing multi-currency collateral risks effectively.

This mode supports multi-asset collateral loans, allowing users to use BTC or other assets as collateral to borrow USDT for trading other futures pairs, enhancing capital flexibility. Moreover, cross-currency hedging is possible. For example, a user holding ETH spot can open a BTC short position to hedge against systemic market risks. Additionally, this mode eliminates the need for frequent asset conversions, allowing traders to directly use their holdings as margin.

The core strategy in this mode is cross-margin arbitrage—users can collateralize Asset A to open leveraged positions in Asset B, leveraging price discrepancies. Furthermore, traders can engage in a collateral-loan-recollateralize cycle to amplify capital efficiency, though careful risk management is required.

It’s important to note that different assets have varying collateral discount rates, so users must closely monitor collateral price fluctuations to avoid insufficient margin, which may lead to forced liquidation.

Portfolio Margin Mode: The Ultimate Solution for Professional Trading and Complex Strategies

The portfolio margin mode involves a high-risk level and an advanced learning curve but offers exceptional capital efficiency, making it best suited for：

  • Options traders who specialize in options and other sophisticated derivatives;
  • Institutions and professional traders requiring advanced risk control mechanisms to maximize capital efficiency.

A key strategy in this mode is delta-neutral trading, which combines spot, futures, and options to bring the overall delta close to zero, reducing the impact of directional market volatility. Another vital strategy is volatility arbitrage, where users profit from calendar spread arbitrage or strike arbitrage of options.

However, this mode demands a high level of expertise. Users must be proficient in Value-at-Risk (VaR) models and stress testing to manage complex risk exposures effectively. Therefore, portfolio margin mode is recommended only for high-net-worth, highly experienced traders.

Unlock a New Era of Trading Efficiency and Risk Management

Gate.io Unified Account is an essential tool for efficiency-driven traders. By selecting the appropriate mode, users can find the optimal balance between risk control and capital utilization, tailoring their strategies to different market conditions. From beginners to professional traders, Gate.io Unified Account offers tailored trading methods to optimize asset management and enhance trading performance.

item.content:encoded:
In a rapidly evolving world, few innovations have captured the imagination and transformative potential of people like blockchain. For Alessio Vinassa, CEO of BlockTechGroup, this technology is more than just a breakthrough in digital transactions—it represents an opportunity to foster shared success, bridge gaps, and create a more inclusive future. His vision is simple but profound: blockchain should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or expertise.

The Power of Shared Success in Blockchain

Alessio Vinassa has long advocated for an approach he calls “shared success.” In an industry often focused on individual gains, he believes the true strength of blockchain lies in its ability to bring people together. “Blockchain is more than a financial tool—it’s a connector,” he asserts. “When we embrace collaboration, we multiply the potential for innovation.”

This philosophy extends beyond words. At BlockTechGroup, the principle of shared success is embedded in the company’s foundation. Working with over 35 projects, Alessio and his team foster an environment where knowledge-sharing and collaboration thrive. By encouraging developers, entrepreneurs, and users to support each other, they create a culture of resilience and sustainable growth.

Breaking Down Barriers to Blockchain Adoption

One of the greatest challenges facing blockchain today is accessibility. While its potential is immense, the complexity of blockchain technology often deters new users. Alessio envisions a future where onboarding is seamless, and participation is intuitive. “Blockchain has the potential to be as transformative as the internet, but for that to happen, we need to lower the barriers to entry,” he explains.

This means building platforms that are easy to use, offering educational resources, and fostering communities that welcome newcomers. Alessio and his team are committed to simplifying blockchain interactions so that anyone—from first-time users to seasoned developers—can engage with and benefit from decentralization.

The Future of Blockchain in Everyday Life

Looking ahead, Alessio believes blockchain will become a foundational part of how people interact, transact, and share knowledge. While financial applications are at the forefront today, he sees the real impact emerging in decentralized services that empower individuals. From secure data sharing to peer-to-peer solutions, blockchain’s role in daily life is only beginning to take shape.

“The future of blockchain isn’t just about technology—it’s about people,” Alessio emphasizes. “It’s about creating systems where users have greater control, where transparency is the norm, and where communities drive progress.” He envisions a world where open-source collaboration fuels meaningful solutions to real-world challenges, making blockchain a truly democratizing force.

A Call to Action: Join the Movement

For those new to blockchain, Alessio’s advice is straightforward: start with the fundamentals. Understanding key principles like decentralization, transparency, and community-driven innovation provides a strong foundation. More importantly, he encourages individuals to find like-minded communities, ask questions, and actively participate.

“Blockchain is still evolving, and there’s a place for everyone,” he says. “Whether you’re a developer, an artist, or simply curious, you have something to contribute. The key is to learn together and grow as a community.”

Driving Innovation with Purpose

At the heart of Alessio Vinassa’s work is a commitment to making blockchain more than just a technology—it’s about impact, empowerment, and shared growth. “The real motivation comes from the people,” he reflects. “The visionaries, the builders, and those who believe in blockchain’s potential to create a better future. That’s what drives me forward.”

As blockchain continues to evolve, leaders like Alessio remind us of its core purpose: to unite, empower, and create opportunities for all. The future of decentralization isn’t just about code—it’s about people coming together to shape a more inclusive digital world.

item.content:encoded:
PAWS, a popular Telegram Mini App, migrates to Solana in reaction to newly imposed requirements by the social media platform.

Telegram recently introduced a policy mandating all Mini Apps and third-party crypto wallets on its platform to exclusively operate on TON, sparking debates about decentralization and preventing multichain expansion. Under this arrangement, Telegram Mini Apps that operated across multiple blockchains had to choose between running solely on TON or leaving the ecosystem altogether.

Among the apps that faced this dilemma is PAWS, a SocialFi project rewarding users for engagement. Rather than remaining confined to a closed ecosystem, PAWS made the decision to migrate to Solana.

Boosting the Solana ecosystem

Moving PAWS’ quickly-amassed user base of 80 millions to Solana resulted in significant additional traffic and boosted the ecosystem. Since the migration, users downloaded over 9 million Phantom crypto wallets and funded more than 1 million new Solana addresses, all happening before PAWS’ token generation event (TGE).

Non-fungible token (NFT) vouchers offered by PAWS also became a significant presence on Solana-based NFT marketplace Magic Eden, sparking more than 100,000 transactions in two weeks. Such developments showcase that a committed community can follow a project through migration to a different chain if the underlying product remains accessible and engaging.

Value extraction versus value injection

The migration revived a long-standing debate revolving around value extraction and value injection. Many blockchain initiatives rely on short bursts of liquidity or speculative token trading, often resulting in value extraction from underlying ecosystems. These models can drive abrupt capital inflows and outflows, intensifying market volatility and exposing ecosystem participants to sudden risks.

The trend is especially relevant for Solana, where high volatility memecoins and recent rug pulls caused significant capital flight. In contrast, PAWS put emphasis on sustained user participation rather than relying solely on speculative token gains. By presenting a model that focuses on consistent engagement, the project seeks to build an ever-growing community growth.

Building an intellectual property

The Solana migration involves a rebranding process to turn the project into an intellectual property and position it as a long-lasting Web3 brand. Moving forward, PAWS aims to evolve from a viral Telegram application into a full-fledged Web3 brand with multiple revenue streams and strong community loyalty.

To achieve this, the project plans to grow its ecosystem through DeFi integrations, gaming partnerships and social engagement tools. Realizing the multichain possibility is on the radar as well, with plans to expand across Ethereum, layer-2 chains and beyond.

Beyond the crypto space, PAWS seeks to establish itself as a recognizable brand through real-world activations, strategic partnerships and mainstream media presence. A key part of this vision is a sustainable token economy, where holders and community members actively participate in governance and ecosystem development.

The transition from a highly engaged Mini App to a sustainable Web3 brand can set a large-scale example of how meme culture can evolve into a legitimate business model within the crypto space.

The broader significance of PAWS’ transition lies in its potential to set a precedent: Can Telegram’s retail-heavy user base become active participants in permissionless blockchain ecosystems? If successful, PAWS may serve as a model for future Web3 projects looking to bridge the gap between closed platforms and decentralized networks.
